DOC.brief_summary: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) one common endocrine disorder woman childbearing age . However , optimal infertility treatment PCOS patient still matter controversy . Despite produce follicle oocytes woman undergo controlled ovarian hyperstimulation IVF cycle , woman PCOS comparable low pregnancy rate . Additionally woman PCOS patient undergo IVF high risk develop ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) , may aggravate pregnancy embryo transfer fresh cycle . Further woman PCOS think high rate later pregnancy complication include spontaneous abortion , pre-eclampsia , preterm labor may relate impaired implantation superovulated endometrium . We propose randomized clinical trial elective embryo cryopreservation follow programmed cycle endometrial preparation frozen embryo transfer ( FET ) compare fresh embryo transfer woman PCOS undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) .
DOC.brief_title: Live Birth After Fresh Embryo Transfer Vs Frozen-thawed Embryo Transfer Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , prospective , randomize ( 1:1 ratio ) clinical trial frozen-thawed embryo transfer vs. fresh embryo transfer uniform gonadotropin-releasing hormone ( GnRH ) antagonist protocol infertile PCOS patient receive IVF therapy . Qualified 1180 patient randomize either two group : group A undergo fresh embryo transfer ( 590 case ) , Group B undergo elective cryopreservation embryo follow transfer thaw embryos programmed endometrium ( 590 case ) . All participant receive recombinant follicule stimulate hormone ( rFSH ) /GnRH antagonist protocol ovarian stimulation standardize luteal phase support . The target population infertile PCOS patient age 20 35 year , diagnose Chinese PCOS Criteria ( i.e . menstrual disorder PLUS either one remain two criterion , hyperandrogenism polycystic ovary ultrasound , exclusion secondary cause hyperandrogenism ovulation dysfunction ) . And subject undergo first IVF intracytoplasmatic sperm injection ( ICSI ) cycle without know factor interfere reproductive metabolic function . The randomization take place oocyte pick-up day on-line randomization system . The pregnancy test result , pregnancy complication , congenital anomaly neonatal complication follow check medical record telephone call .
DOC.criteria: Women diagnose PCOS accord Chinese PCOS diagnosis criterion ; Women ≥1 year history infertility ; Women age ≥20 < 35 year old ; Women body weight ≥40kg ; Women least one follow indication IVF ICSI : 1 . Ovulation dysfunction fail become pregnant ovulation induction treatment ; 2 . Tubal factor : unilateral bilateral tubal obstruction , adhesion , unilateral bilateral Salpingectomy tubal ligation ; 3 . Male factor : oligoasthenozoospermia , obstructive azoospermia ; Women undergo first cycle IVF ICSI ; Women retrieve oocyte number > 3 ; Women capable give informed consent . Women underwent unilateral ovariectomy ; Women diagnose uterus abnormality : malformed uterus ( uterus unicorn , septate uterus , duplex uterus , uterus bicomis ) , adenomyosis , submucous myoma , intrauterine adhesion ; Women partner abnormal chromosome karyotype include chromosome polymorphism ; Women experience recurrent spontaneous abortion ( include biochemical pregnancy abortion ) 2 time ; Women medical condition represent contraindication assist reproductive technology and/or pregnancy ; Women develop severe OHSS oocyte pickup day ; Women retrieve oocyte number ≤3 ; Women unable comply study procedure .
